response.answer:
According to the HR Policy Detailed document, employees are entitled to 20 annual leaves, 12 sick leaves, and 8 casual leaves per year [HR_Policy_Detailed.pdf, chunk_1]. 

The annual leave policy is as follows: entitlement is 20 working days per calendar year, accrual is pro-rated for joining mid-year, application is to be submitted via HR portal minimum 7 days in advance, approval is required from manager, HR, and payroll, and carry-forward is allowed up to 5 days to the next year [HR_Policy_Detailed.pdf, chunk_1]. 

Additionally, the document states that the company provides health insurance after probation, covering the employee and family up to PKR 500K/year [HR_Policy_Detailed.pdf, chunk_4].
